## Conversion.convalidate() function

Convert or validate `unknown` to `Result<T>`<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function convalidate<T, TC = unknown>(cv: ValidatorOrConverter<T, TC>, from: unknown, context?: TC): Result<T>;
```
